data.event: Fortuna was founded in 1913 along a Soo Line Railroad branch line running between Flaxton, North Dakota and Whitetail, Montana.

event.title: the latest sunset time on the summer

data.event: Fortuna, North Dakota has the latest sunset time on the summer solstice (June 23) in the contiguous, lower 48 States.
Fortuna's westerly location in the time zone gives it the latest local time when the sun sets on the summer solstice.
